channel.title: Shokofins on Shoko
channel.description: Recent content in Shokofins on Shoko

item.title: Configure Shokofin
item.description: The Configuration page is still a WIP. In the meantime until it goes live then I will suggest asking in our discord server if you need help configuring the plugin.

item.title: Install Shokofin
item.description: Requirements The plugin requires a version of Jellyfin greater or equal to 10.7.0 (>=10.7.0) and an unstable version of Shoko Server greater or equal to 4.1.1 (>=4.1.1) to be installed. It also requires that you have already set up and are using Shoko Server, and that the directories/folders you intend to use in Jellyfin are fully indexed (and optionally managed) by Shoko Server, otherwise the plugin won’t be able to funciton properly — it won’t be able to find metadata about any entries that are not indexed by Shoko Server since the metadata we want is not available.
